entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid CS8602 calling base constructor when using primary constructors #68384
  • Wrong error message (out parameter must be assigned to before control leaves) #68380
  • Code Cleanup always makes private field as readonly #68378
  • When moving class to another namespace, the this. qualification is removed from the code (IDE0009). #68377
  • Rename doubles characters when identifier is at the end of the document #68375
  • Cursor jumps while renaming in the editor #68374

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' when parameter name matches a keyword name #68385
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Match short lowercase substrings in pattern matcher #68383
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement IOperation support for inline array access #68373
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't give duplicate member error for explicit implementations of different file-local interfaces with same source name #68331
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • add Version.Details entries for source-build product build #68371
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Clear dead links to feature branches in `Language Feature Status.md` #68317
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests of `IDE0060` to `VerifyCS` #68350
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
